Main.title: Everything you need to know for your days in Cataratas

foz.title: Foz do Iguaçu
foz.description: Foz do Iguaçu is a city in the state of Paraná, Brazil. It is located in the southwestern region of the country, on the border with Argentina and Paraguay. It is known for being the gateway to the Iguazu Falls, one of the most important natural attractions in the world.

puerto.title: Puerto Iguazú
puerto.description: Puerto Iguazú is a city in the province of Misiones, Argentina. It is located in the northeastern region of the country, on the border with Brazil and Paraguay. It is known for being the gateway to the Iguazu Falls, one of the most important natural attractions in the world.

cde.title: Ciudad del Este
cde.description: Ciudad del Este is a city in Paraguay, located in the Alto Paraná Department, on the border with Brazil and Argentina. It is part of the Triple Frontier Area, which is considered one of the most important commercial and tourist centers in South America.

Metadata.title: Iguazu Guru
Metadata.description: All the information you need for your days in Cataratas, Puerto Iguazu, Foz do Iguaçu and Ciudad del Este.

cde.title: Ciudad del Este
cde.description: Ciudad del Este is a city in Paraguay, located in the Alto Paraná Department, on the border with Brazil and Argentina. It is part of the Tri-Border Area, which is considered one of the most important commercial and tourist centers in South America.

puerto.title: Puerto Iguazu
puerto.description: Puerto Iguazú is a city in the province of Misiones, Argentina. It is located in the northeastern region of the country, on the border with Brazil and Paraguay. It is known for being the gateway to the Iguazú Falls, one of the most important natural attractions in the world.

foz.description: Foz do Iguaçu is a city in the state of Paraná, Brazil. It is located in the southwestern region of the country, on the border with Argentina and Paraguay. It is known for being the gateway to the Iguaçu Falls, one of the most important natural attractions in the world.
